markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sense Thoughts](/Feats.aspx?ID=985) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Share Thoughts](/Feats.aspx?ID=977)

</column>

---

You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking. You can cast [_mind reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) as an innate occult spell once per day.
name: Sense Thoughts
